General.Name: Nanjing Gaoke Co Ltd
General.Description: Nanjing Gaoke Company Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the development of real estate properties in China. The company designs and develops mid-to-high-end commercial housing, municipal, and landscape projects; provides sewage treatment and tap water supply services; and grants loans to technology-based small and medium-sized enterprises, as well as provides financing guarantees. In addition, the company is involved in the industrial investment, venture capital, securities investment, investment management and consulting, and other investment activities; and provision of financing services for small and medium-sized technology companies, and start-up businesses. Further, it engages in the production and sale of various Chinese and Western medicine preparations, as well as provision of medical and health care consulting and services. The company was formerly known as Nanjing Xingang High-Tech Co., Ltd. Nanjing Gaoke Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is based in Nanjing, China.
General.Address: Building A, Hi-Tech Center, Nanjing, China, 210023
